data.description: A dynamic form builder package that allows you to create and manage multi-step forms in Flutter based on JSON configuration. It supports custom form validation, stepper navigation, and flexible form field types, making it a powerful tool for building complex forms with ease.

Whisk and Serve is a modular recipe application structured into several modules: whisk_and_serve_core, which includes core features such as user authentication, data models, and shared utilities for seamless operation; whisk_and_serve_explore, which helps users discover new recipes through search, filters, and detailed recipe views; and whisk_and_serve_favourites, which enables users to save and manage their favorite recipes for easy access.
